vendor_name: SAii Lagoon Maldives, Curio Collection by Hilton
title: Idyllic Maldives Retreat with Daily Breakfast, US$100 Dining Credit, Speedboat Transfers & One Child Stays Free
description:
Picture yourself waking up in the Maldives on a dreamy atoll, surrounded by luminous blue waters and white powdery sands with clear skies that melt into the ocean... A five-star stay at SAii Lagoon Maldives, Curio Collection by Hilton, is the idyllic island haven where this dream-like vision comes to life. Part of the incredible CROSSROADS Maldives complex, just a 15-minute boat ride from Malé, this stylish resort and sister property to the iconic Hard Rock Hotel Maldives is surrounded by the translucent waters of the stunning Emboodhoo Lagoon and puts The Marina @ CROSSROADS' exciting dining, shopping and entertainment options at your fingertips.

Spend your days making use of exquisite facilities: get a taste for top-notch cuisine at the several onsite restaurants, reach extraordinary levels of relaxation at the Lèn Be Well Spa complex or plunge into the gleaming pool that looks out across the ocean. Set sail from the prestigious Yacht Marina @ CROSSROADS, expand your local know-how at the Marine Discovery Centre and Maldives Discovery Centre or enjoy complimentary resort activities such as sunrise yoga, aqua gym classes and Zumba. Travelling with children? Koimala & Maalimi’s Junior Beach Club and Camp will entertain for hours and hours, so you can unwind in peace.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Up to one child (17 and under) stays and eats free from the kids' menu
- Roundtrip speedboat transfers to the resort from Malé for two adults and one child (under 7)
- Daily à la carte breakfast
- US$100 dining credit per package to use across the resort's restaurants
- 10 cocktails per package to redeem at any of the resort's bars (adults only)
- Complimentary use of kayaking, pedal boats and snorkelling gear
- Unwind with resort activities including sunrise yoga and zumba, and aqua gym and cocktail classes
- Upload enviable snaps with high-speed Wi-Fi throughout your stay

**Overwater Villa Upgrade:** Immerse yourself in the quintessential Maldives experience with a stay in an Overwater Villa, featuring direct access to the sparkling lagoon from your private deck.

**Daily Dining Upgrade:** Nothing says decadence quite like an all-inclusive dining upgrade, where you'll be treated to à la carte breakfast, lunch and dinner at your pick of onsite restaurants. Plus, children (17 and under) eat free from the kids' menu or receive a 50% discount on the regular menu.

**Book with Confidence:** We work directly with our trusted partners and provide 24/7 customer service to ensure that no matter what happens, we’re here to help. If your escape is affected by Covid-19 restrictions, we will do our best to assist you with a date change or provide you with a Luxury Escapes credit for another Limited Time Lux Exclusive accommodation, tour or cruise offer, less any unrecoverable costs; excludes flights. [Find out more](https://luxuryescapes.com/escape-with-confidence)
